name: Hope (itch) (Nonamefornowsoft)
description:
Hope is a game about a future where there is only two people left.

Made for OpenJam.

Game by pcmxms (https://twitter.com/nonamefornowso1) using:

Ubuntu: https://ubuntu.com/

Godot Engine: https://godotengine.org/

Font: https://lqdev.itch.io/geompixel

Gimp: https://www.gimp.org/

Git: https://github.com/ (clone it at: https://github.com/pcmxms/Hope)
